description: DA rule has been deleted in the Windows Firewall exception list. Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Deteled Rule in Windows Firewall with Advanced Security
query: (winlog.event_id:("2006" OR "2033") AND (NOT (ModifyingApplication:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe" OR ModifyingApplication:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*))))
